definition: to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

sentences.english: The case was about a screenwriter plagiarizing another writer's novel.
sentences.chinese: 此案是关于一位编剧抄袭另一个作家的小说。

sentences.english: Graduated from Drama. Literature Department of Shanghai Theatre Academy, State level A scriptwriter.
sentences.chinese: 上海戏剧学院戏剧文学系毕业，国家一级编剧。

sentences.english: I once walked past the young child of a script supervisor, and he burst into tears.
sentences.chinese: 有一次我从编剧的小孩面前走过，他立刻放声大哭。

sentences.english: I just want to put pressure on some Chinese directors and scriptwriters.
sentences.chinese: 我只是想给国内的一些导演和编剧施点压。

sentences.english: The novel of the same name by the famous writer Wang Zhijun.
sentences.chinese: 同名小说由著名编剧王志军著。

sentences.english: Most current scriptwriting software will allow you this printing option.
sentences.chinese: 现在大多数编剧软件可以提供这个打印选项。

sentences.english: Read books about screenwriting written by successful screenwriters.
sentences.chinese: 阅读一些业内优秀编剧所写的关于剧本创作的书。

sentences.english: The scriptwriter of this detective movie has designed a good plot.
sentences.chinese: 这部侦探电影的编剧设计了一个很好的情节。

sentences.english: Five different directors and 14 writers were involved in various stages of pre-production.
sentences.chinese: 5位导演和14位编剧参与了各阶段的前期制作。

sentences.english: DeMille would have many mistresses, but only a few screenwriters.
sentences.chinese: 德米尔可能有很多情妇，但他的编剧只有几个。

sentences.english: The Oscar-winning scribe was charged with vehicular manslaughter.
sentences.chinese: 这位奥斯卡最佳编剧奖获得者被控过失杀人。

sentences.english: "She's someone I would really like to be," said creator Emma.
sentences.chinese: 编剧艾玛说，“我真的想变得和这个人物一样。”

sentences.english: Now he works as a successful screenwriter, using touch-typing.
sentences.chinese: 现在，他是成为用触键打字且成功的编剧。

sentences.english: Do screenwriters think that loose hair makes it hard to concentrate?
sentences.chinese: 编剧们认为头发飘飘就不能集中精力吗？

sentences.english: Ministry of Culture in 1949 by the Film Board of script writing any screenplay.
sentences.chinese: 1949年在文化部电影局剧本创作所任编剧。

sentences.english: The initial work of the screenwriter is usually referred to, simply, as the first draft.
sentences.chinese: 编剧最初的作品通常被称为初稿。

definition: script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
cast (of a movie etc)/lineup of performers/troupe
to write and direct (a play, film etc)/playwright-director/choreographer-director/scenarist-director
